did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Reports, speeches, job files, articles, publications, and a transcript of an interview.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Reports, speeches, job files, articles, and publications of Arthur Bohnen, concerning city and regional planning, housing, and urban renewal. Also, transcript of interview of Otar Aamodt, by Bohnen, 1977.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, Ely Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Reports, speeches, job files, articles, and publications of Arthur Bohnen, concerning city and regional planning, housing, and urban renewal. Also, transcript of interview of Otar Aamodt, by Bohnen, 1977.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Arthur Bohnen papers, #3195. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. Reports (including feasability, rental market, and land demand studies)
Boxes 1-2

Series II. Volunteer work for the International Executive Service Corps
Box 3

Series III. Publications by Bohnen and relating to his work
Boxes 3-4, 8

Series IV. Subject files (speeches, clippings, notes)
Boxes 4-5

Series VI. Lambda Alpha International
Boxes 7-8
